1013.issue: [W1013] Please test whether adapter can support compact mode, if not set "common.compact:false" at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json).

1054.issue: [W1054] Missing suggested translation into uk of some "common.news" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json).

1057.issue: [E1057] js-controller 2.0.0 listed as dependency but 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json).

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1079.issue: [W1079] "common.materializeTab" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.tab".

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json).

1105.issue: [W1105] [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/io-package.json) schema validation error: Missing required property "licenseInformation" in /common

4038.issue: [S4038] .vscode/settings.json file missing "json.schemas" property. Add schema definitions for better IntelliSense support.

5005.issue: [W5005] setTimeout found in "main.js", but no clearTimeout detected

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process issue [[#628] "Migration to ESLint 9 and @iobroker/eslint-config"](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/issues/628)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0029.issue: [E0029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '10.17.0' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/package.json).

0033.issue: [E0033] @iobroker/adapter-core 2.6.8 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/package.json)

0036.issue: [E0036] @iobroker/testing 4.1.0 specified. 4.1.3 is required as minimum,  5.2.2 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.ham/blob/master/package.json)
